definition: woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
lady who has given birth twice

sentences.english: More than 2 cases of maternal uterine scar due to reasons outside the cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 余2例产妇因瘢痕子宫外的原因而进行剖宫产术。

sentences.english: Objective To promote the intervention for preventing the mother-to-infant transmission of HIV among HIV infected pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 目的促进艾滋病感染孕产妇母婴阻断干预措施的实施。

sentences.english: The woman was startled to see a stranger.
sentences.chinese: 那位产妇发现是位陌生人，惊跳起来。

sentences.english: It says most infant deaths happen in regions where maternal mortality rates are the highest.
sentences.chinese: 大部分婴儿死亡数发生在孕产妇死亡率最高的地区。

sentences.english: The report also calls on the government to address the shortage of maternal-care providers.
sentences.chinese: 还提醒政府提供产妇保健的人员过少。

sentences.english: Due to irregular menstruation, to maternal and child health hospital doctor.
sentences.chinese: 由于月经不调，产妇和儿童保健医院的医生。

sentences.english: Occiput anterior is usually the easiest position for the fetal head to traverse the maternal pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 枕前通常是胎儿最易经过产妇骨盆的胎位。

sentences.english: The term "breech presentation" refers to the mother's position on the delivery table while giving birth.
sentences.chinese: “臀先露”定义为产妇分娩时在产床上的体位。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate status of sleep of rooming-in periods puerpera and its relative factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解母婴同室病房产妇的睡眠状况及相关因素。

sentences.english: Occiput anterior is usually the easiest position for the fetal head to traverse the maternal pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 枕前通常是胎儿最易通过产妇骨盆的胎位。

sentences.english: Now we use a number of tests to target our efforts on those in high-risk groups.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们着力采用一些产前检查来观测高危产妇。

sentences.english: In China and India, many new moms practice the tradition of postpartum confinementafter the birth of a child.
sentences.chinese: 在中国和印度，许多产妇妈妈都有坐月子的传统。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of home follow-up to the quality of life of primiparas during puerperium.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨家庭探访对初产妇产褥期生活质量的影响。

sentences.english: Used for lying-in women and women who are suffering catamenia blood.
sentences.chinese: 同时可用于产妇和经血较多的妇女。

sentences.english: The satisfaction was improved when the nursing service was ameliorated.
sentences.chinese: 改进护理服务措施后，产妇满意度较前有明显提高。

sentences.english: So, pregnant puerpera Ying Shen uses wind oily energy.
sentences.chinese: 所以，孕产妇应慎用风油精。

definition: to give birth without complications/easy childbirth/safe delivery/natural birth (without surgical operation)
postnatal period/puerperium (period of six weeks after childbirth)
to convalesce for a month following childbirth, following a special diet, and observing various taboos to protect the body from exposure to the "wind"
